meanings.sent1: She is the gabbier one in our group, always chatting away.
meanings.sent2: My sister is gabbier than me; she never stops talking!
meanings.sent3: The parrot in the pet store was even gabbier than the salesperson!
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed like a gabbier river, never ceasing.
meanings.sent5: His gabbier nature made him the life of the party.

meanings.sent1: Among the students, she was the gabbier one, always sharing stories.
meanings.sent2: The new puppy was gabbier than the old dog, barking at everything.
meanings.sent3: The gabbier cat in the shelter meowed loudly to get attention.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was gabbier than the sound of a thousand bells.
meanings.sent5: His gabbier personality shone through in every conversation.
